Oatmeal Monday Power Bowl

Preparation:
3 min
Cooking:
2 min
Calories:
150 ccal
Recipe by:
Yuriy
Share
Twitter Facebook Email
Ingredients
1 banana, mashed
2 tablespoons of chia seeds
40 g oats
1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
160 g almond milk
80 g water

For garnish:
soaked almonds, pepita seeds, cinnamon, toasted coconut, nut butter, spices (cinnamon, ginger, allspice).
Directions

The night before, mash the banana in a medium bowl until smooth. Add in the chia, oats, cinnamon, milk, and water until combined. Put in the fridge for the night.

In the morning scoop the oat mixture into a medium pot. Increase heat to medium-high and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat immediately to medium-low, and stir frequently until heated throughout and thickened.
